title: Theft Mapper
summary: An application to view bike theft data. THFTMPPR taps into data collected by bikeindex.org and displays it on a map with 4 different visualization layers, pinpoint, heatmap, Delaunay Triangulations and Voronoi polygons.

title: Dungeon of DOOM
summary: Roam the deep and battle it out with dwellers of the dark places. A dungeon crawl with turn based dice battle mechanics.

title: mbshull.com
summary: This portfolio was created with love and React. Please submit all complaints regarding the design in writing to me@mbshull.com

title: Pangram Ipsum
summary: A Saturday afternoon project inspired by a tweet about Lorem Ipsum scaring away a squarespace user. I decided to see how quickly I could get a Pangram Ipsum generator deployed. Result: ~2 hours from conception to v1.

title: Color Swatch Library
summary: Programmatically created Swatch library with Tints and Shades.

title: Optiplot
summary: A full stack application to plan your garden. Optiplot aims to help optimize your background garden space by helping you group compatible plants together while optimizing your use of space
